name: Nathaniel TURNER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Turner v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Nathaniel TURNER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of April, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and the Application for an Immediate Hearing are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
41 A.3d 1285
Nathaniel TURNER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA, Respondent.
No. 170 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 18, 2012.
